DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether micronized dehydrated human amniotic membrane ( dHACM ) suspension effective reduce inflammation conservative measure alone use treat acute/early lateral epicondylitis .
DOC.brief_title: Micronized Dehydrated Human Amniotic Membrane Suspension Treatment Lateral Epicondylitis
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old . Medicare patient may select . Both male female patient select . A negative xray elbow Diagnosis lateral epicondylitis history exam symptom longer one year . Females childbearing potential must willing use acceptable method contraception ( birth control pill , barrier , abstinence ) . Patient understands willing participate clinical study comply weekly visit followup regimen . Patient read sign IRB/IEC approve Informed Consent Form screening procedure undertake . Prior surgery site Site exhibit clinical sign symptom infection . History chronic soft tissue inflammation 6 month . A positive Xray fracture significant anatomic abnormality include fracture , advance arthritis , excessive calcification , etc . No history corticosteroid injection within past 30 day . Joint instability No rheumatologic condition involve elbow . No evidence significant neurological entrapment neurological disease forearm Concurrent cervical radiculopathy The presence comorbidities confuse exacerbate condition include : Previous elbow trauma Previous elbow surgery Patients history two week treatment immunosuppressant ( include systemic corticosteroid ) , cytotoxic chemotherapy within one month prior initial screening , receive medication screen period , anticipated require medication course study . ( i.e . one month `` washout period '' drug . ) Patients investigational drug ( ) therapeutic device ( ) within 30 day precede screening . History radiation site . Known history Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome ( AIDS ) HIV . Patients unable understand aim objectives trial . Presence condition ( ) seriously compromise subject 's ability complete study , know history poor adherence medical treatment . Pregnant breast feeding . No pregnancy within past 6 month .
